global.error-occurred: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
global.name: Name

session.body-session-expired: Would you like to keep working without session? If you choose 'No', you will be redirected to the login page.

login.popover-get-code: If your credentials are correct, you will receive an email with your login code within the next 2 minutes. Otherwise, check your email and password and try again.
login.popover-login-failed: One or more of the three credential components is incorrect (email, password or code). Please verify them and try again.
login.register-success-modal-body: You will receive an email with the instructions to complete the GuardedBox registration process. You can now close this page.
login.register-mail-just-sent: A registration email was sent to {email} a few minutes ago. Please, follow the instructions in the email to complete the registration process.

registration.title: Create an account
registration.info-password: Please, choose a very strong password. It must have at least {passwordMinlength} characters. Try to use a passphrase you can remember, rather than a simple password. Your password will be used to encrypt your secrets. If you forget this password, you will not have access to your secrets!. IMPORTANT: The current GuardedBox version doesn't support changing the password.
registration.registration-completed: Your account has been successfully registered.
registration.registration-token-not-found: Sorry, the registration link is not valid. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.registration-token-expired: Sorry, the registration link has expired. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.password-insufficient-length: Your password must have at least {passwordMinLength} characters.

accounts.email-already-registered: Email {email} is already registered in GuardedBox.
accounts.email-not-registered: Email {email} is not registered in GuardedBox.

my-account.title: My account
my-account.delete-account-modal-body: Your account "{email}" will be permanently deleted. All your secrets, shared secrets and groups will be deleted as well. This operation is irreversible! Are you sure?
my-account.incorrect-introduced-mail: The email you typed is not your email

my-secrets.title: My secrets
my-secrets.no-secrets: Your box of secrets is empty!
my-secrets.delete-secret-modal-body: The secret "{secret}" will be deleted! Are you sure?

shared-secrets.remove-receiver: Are you sure you want to stop sharing the secret "{secret}" with "{email}"?
shared-secrets.do-not-self-share: You cannot share secrets with yourself.
shared-secrets.secret-already-shared-with-email: This secret is already shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-email: The secret is not shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-you: The secret is not shared with you.

secrets-shared-with-me.title: Secrets shared with me
secrets-shared-with-me.no-secrets: There are no secrets shared with you.
secrets-shared-with-me.reject-shared-secret-modal-body: Are you sure you want to reject the shared secret "{secret}"?

groups.title: Groups
groups.no-owned-groups: You do not have any groups.
groups.remove-participant: Are you sure that you want to remove "{email}" from the group "{group}"?
groups.participant-groups: Groups to which I am invited
groups.no-participant-groups: You have not been invited to any group.
groups.delete-group-modal-body: The group "{group}" will be deleted! Are you sure?
